inclusion.criterion: Bone age less than 14 ½ years at study initiation.
inclusion.label: unknown
not_met
inclusion.evidence: breast bulb were in stage 1 with no course hair

inclusion.criterion: Idiopathic short stature will be defined as a short child equal or less than -2SD for height, with normal GH responses to stimuli (> or = 5ng/ml to at least 2 secretagogues) or a normal IGF-I and BP-3, normal body proportions and no other identifiable growth pathology.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Accurate growth data for at least 6 months at baseline is available.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous use of hormonal treatment with AIs, sex steroids or GH in the preceding 6 months.
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: treats with GH since 6 months ago

exclusion.criterion: Birth weight small for gestational age (SGA).
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 12 year old girl with Turner syndrome, treating with GH without estrogen therapy.
